name: comprehensive-audit
description: Full site analysis using parallel subagents for speed and depth

subagents.name: Traffic Analysis
subagents.prompt:
You are analyzing traffic patterns for {site_id}. Run these analyses:

1. Overall Metrics (last 30 days vs previous 30 days):
   - Visitors, pageviews, bounce rate, visit duration, views per visit
   - Calculate % changes and identify notable (>15%) or significant (>30%) changes

2. Traffic Sources Breakdown:
   - Top 10 sources by visitors
   - Bounce rate and quality metrics by source
   - Identify best and worst performing sources

3. Growth Trends:
   - Compare last 7 days vs previous 7 days
   - Identify if growth is accelerating, stable, or declining

Provide a concise report with:
- Key findings (3-5 bullet points)
- Traffic quality assessment
- Top opportunities

subagents.name: Content Performance
subagents.prompt:
You are analyzing content performance for {site_id}. Run these analyses:

1. Top Performers (last 30 days):
   - Top 20 pages by visitors
   - Engagement metrics: bounce rate, time on page
   - Identify what makes top content successful

2. Problem Pages:
   - Pages with >100 visitors and >80% bounce rate
   - Pages with <20 seconds time on page
   - High-traffic, low-engagement pages

3. Entry Page Analysis:
   - Top 15 entry pages
   - Entry page quality (bounce, duration)
   - SEO landing page effectiveness

**CRITICAL - API Restrictions:**
- For bounce_rate/visit_duration: Use dimension "visit:entry_page" NOT "event:page"
- For time_on_page: Use dimension "event:page" (this is event metric)
- Cannot mix session metrics (bounce_rate) with event dimensions (event:page)
- Run separate queries if you need both types of data

Provide a concise report with:
- Best performing content (and why)
- Problem pages requiring attention
- Content optimization opportunities
queries_needed: Top pages by visitors with time_on_page (use event:page)

subagents.name: User Engagement
subagents.prompt:
You are analyzing user engagement patterns for {site_id}. Run these analyses:

1. Engagement by Source:
   - Bounce rate by traffic source
   - Visit duration by source
   - Views per visit by source
   - Identify which sources bring quality traffic

2. Engagement Trends:
   - Compare engagement metrics: 30d current vs previous
   - Identify improving or declining patterns

3. User Journey Quality:
   - Overall views per visit (should be >2)
   - Average visit duration (should be >90s for blogs)
   - Bounce rate assessment (blog: 60-70%, landing pages: <50%)

**CRITICAL - API Restrictions:**
- bounce_rate, visit_duration, views_per_visit are SESSION METRICS
- Use them with visit dimensions: visit:source, visit:device, visit:country
- Or use them without dimensions for overall metrics
- NEVER mix with event:page, event:goal, or event:hostname

Provide a concise report with:
- Engagement health assessment
- Best and worst quality sources
- Navigation and internal linking opportunities
queries_needed: Engagement metrics by source (use visit:source - this works!)

subagents.name: Technical & Device Analysis
subagents.prompt:
You are analyzing technical performance for {site_id}. Run these analyses:

1. Device Performance:
   - Desktop vs Mobile visitors, bounce rates
   - Identify device-specific issues (mobile bounce >10% higher = UX problem)

2. Browser/Platform Issues:
   - Check if specific browsers have unusually high bounce
   - Identify technical compatibility issues

3. Geographic Performance (if significant international traffic):
   - Top countries/regions
   - Quality differences by location

Provide a concise report with:
- Technical issues identified
- Device-specific problems
- Recommendations for technical improvements

sections.name: Executive Summary
sections.content: Synthesize 3-5 most important findings across all reports

sections.name: Priority Actions
sections.content:
Ranked list of 5-7 specific actions with impact/effort assessment:
- Critical (do now)
- High priority (this week)
- Medium priority (this month)

cross_analysis.insight: Lower quality traffic sources - review new sources and consider filtering

cross_analysis.condition: high bounce on mobile but not desktop
cross_analysis.insight: Mobile UX issues - test mobile experience, page speed, responsive design

cross_analysis.condition: top pages have high bounce despite good traffic
cross_analysis.insight: Content-conversion gap - add CTAs, internal links, related content
SEO issue - check rankings, review technical SEO, analyze entry pages
